data.text: We’re excited to present our inaugural Airbus A350! A new level of service and new long-haul travel options! Aeroflot will take delivery of 11 A350s by the end of 2020. https://t.co/dbZQSPjh2T @Airbus #Aeroflot #A350 https://t.co/ZxKDomArRh

The new generation А350-900WXB full-flight simulator is designed by CAE, a global leader in training for the civil aviation. Our flight crews have been training
for over 4 months with almost 50 pilots completing the A350 course so far! #Aeroflot https://t.co/W66ZkP0z0G
Aeroflot announces FY 2019 IFRS financial results https://t.co/XjDEF2TIJY

We’re about to start operating our new Airbus A350-900 widebody aircraft✈️ In the run-up to the launch, our pilots have been taking rigorous training on the A350 full flight simulator. #Aeroflot #A350 #Airbus https://t.co/fX3PAN7Dzd

Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays! 
You know that Orthodox Christmas falls on January 7 due the Julian calendar. In Russia, we also have two New Years: on January 1 and on January 14. Want to extend your holidays? Come to visit!
#Aeroflot #HappyHolidays https://t.co/X1hKXKXL6l

data.text: Aeroflot introduces hand-luggage-only fares on selected long-haul routes https://t.co/1djgyE1frF

One of our Boeing B737-800s is named after Yuri Nikulin (born on 18th of
December, 1921). He was a great comedian, the most famous Russian clown and
 a film star. National hits with Nikulin are popular with a few generations of Russians. #Aeroflot #GreatNames #AircrfatNames https://t.co/lghdCEsDeE

data.text:
Ded Moroz, or Grandfather Frost is a Russian colleague of Santa Claus: both bring presents🎁 
There are a few things that make them different. How many can you name? 
#Aeroflot #Quiz https://t.co/UiJPr8CHTU
Aeroflot expands Asia route offering with four flights weekly to Osaka https://t.co/ZZIbyQqQWQ

Do you know the «winteriest» Russian food? Pelmeni, our dumplings originated in Sibiria, are at the heart of Russian cuisine. On December 15, the dumplings festival opens in Chelyabinsk. #Aeroflot #ExploreRussia https://t.co/YYz24a3bWD

One of the Aeroflot aircraft is named after Russian
coaching legend Anatoly Tarasov, the father of Russian hockey. Tarasov turned
the national team into invincible Red Machine, which had remained unbeaten
for decades. #Aeroflot #GreatNames #AircraftNames https://t.co/8FMmhFo7GD

data.text: Great Russian poet Fyodor Tyutchev was born 214 years ago on this day. He wasn’t a professional poet, and served in the Russian Foreign Ministry. He reflected a lot on how Russia "fits" into the European ensemble. Our A330 commemorates this great name. #Aeroflot #AircraftNames https://t.co/ua8CBF7nAI
Aeroflot confirms National Corporate Governance Rating of 7++ https://t.co/xktzuL6A9O

Ski resorts in Sochi attract both locals and tourists for skiing and freeriding. 102 km of classy slopes with more than 1500 meters elevation. That’s one of the reasons why ‘Rosa Khutor’ has been awarded by prestigious World
Ski Awards 7 times! #Aeroflot #ExploreRussia https://t.co/SNEmLtLQyQ

data.text:
Dear friends! We would like to remind you that you don’t need to turn off your
mobile phone or tablet, even during takeoff and landing; you just have to
enable the offline mode ('flight mode') or turn off the cellular connection. Have a good flight! https://t.co/p93ffnOu4p

data.text: This is one of the reasons why we highly recommend our award-winning Business class. #Aeroflot #BusinessClass #TrueBeauty https://t.co/A31cIqyrdi
Information for passengers flying from Sheremetyevo Airport https://t.co/1eS8sIjyrJ

Aeroflot has won at the Grand Final of  World Travel Awards 2019, the most prestigious accolade in global tourism. We’ve reaffirmed our status as World’s Leading Airline Brand and World's Leading Airline - Business Class. https://t.co/WtzjPrT6nl
#Aeroflot #WorldTravelAwards https://t.co/PVUyn32dPY

annotations.normalized_text: Grand Final of  World Travel Awards 2019

data.text: Take a look at our destination map and choose where to travel to next. This winter season Aeroflot operates flights to 149 destinations in 53 countries. For details please see https://t.co/PL1ofJ7ecy #Aeroflot https://t.co/vJc5rBIUqY

data.text: How many buttons are there in a cockpit? The answer varies by airplane type. There are about 350 different controls reachable by the two pilots. This is an Airbus A320 cockpit with so many panels, levers and switches. #Aeroflot #Professionals https://t.co/eAqwL8W9vh

Fly with Nikolay Pirogov. Professor Pirogov, a prominent Russian doctor who is credited with the creation of modern military surgery. He once treated Italian
revolutionary Giuseppe Garibaldi’s wound.
#Aeroflot #GreatNames #AircraftNames https://t.co/iLcyBXmnMN

entity.name: Doctor Who
entity.description: Extraterrestre de 900 ans, le Docteur est un aventurier qui voyage à travers le temps et l'espace à l'aide de son vaisseau, le TARDIS. Ils fait de nombreuses rencontres sur les diverses planètes qu'il explore...

data.text:
For Russians, going back to the house is a portent of bad luck. So if a Russian discovers after leaving the house that he has forgotten something, he'll make a point of looking himself in the eye at the mirror. This is another trick  to deceive an evil omen.
#Aeroflot #FunnyFact https://t.co/Bgpf7KQ74w

There are two picturesque places in Moscow and in St. Petersburg which are often compared and even confused. What about you? Can you name them? Do you feel in Russia when admiring it? 
#Aeroflot #CityQuiz https://t.co/wkmc0qGFNu

Did you know what is it? You'll be surprised. That’s how the buckwheat looks like in Russia. It’s brown – because it’s roasted. You can try it aboard Aeroflot. It's healthy and yami! https://t.co/aE5nhUuv2l

Russia has 15 cities with more than a million people. How many can you name?
#Aeroflot#CityQuiz https://t.co/dh1K5KyCml
Information for passengers travelling from Geneva https://t.co/6UoJ1eO3bv
